author: brane
msg: On the svn-auth-x509 branch: Update the JavaHL authentication and
credentials APIs to match the changes in certificate processing.
with subjectPattern, that matches the cert subject and also any
Remove the commented-out code for addCredential.
Change the constructor to accept a single Base64-encoded
certificate instead of pre-parsed cert info.
Update the constructor implementation so that it parses
the certificate and extracts the information needed
Update the call to the AuthnCallback::SSLServerCertInfo constructor.
Update the handling of the cert subject and hostnames. Do not add
the valid-from and valid-to dates to the full-text search.
(UtilTests.util_cred_ssl_server): Add a valid certificate to the test data.

author: bpetri
msg: updated references to reflect TLP status

author: daijy
msg: PIG-4047: Break up pig withouthadoop and fat jar (PIG-4047-4.patch)

author: brock
msg: HIVE-7459 - Fix NPE when an empty file is included in a Hive query that uses CombineHiveInputFormat (Matt Martin, Ryan Blue via Brock)

author: pottlinger
msg: Added new system property rat.skip:boolean to be able to skip plugin execution.
Added last days commits to RELEASE_NOTES for 0.11-SNAPSHOT and in webpage templates (no rebuild triggered):
- integrated mvn default goal in Quick start
- fixed dozens of JavaDoc problems with Java8's javadoc that made maven-site-plugin:3.3 fail.
- Updated to maven-plugin-tools-javadoc, maven-plugin-plugin 3.3 (from 3.2) in the process of getting a solution for https://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MPLUGIN-237
- to reduce amount of deprecation warnings: use org.junit.Assert instead of junit.framework.Assert
- removed [WARNING] Deprecated @component for project field in org.apache.rat.mp.RatReportMojo/RatCheckMojo.: replace with @parameter name="${project}" @readonly in abstract super class
- removed unnecessary public keywords in some interfaces
